episode.title: GGGカップ開催! オールスター大集合!
The GGG Cup Opens! All-Star, Assemble!
GGG Cup Kaisai! All-Star Dai Shuugou!
episode.summary: Guru Bunbuku organizes an amazing Buddyfight tournament for Gao, featuring familiar faces and a whole bunch of surprises. Gao reunites with his first Buddy, Drum. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: パル子がバブ~っ! 牙王, 初めての実況!!
Paruko`s a Baby? Gao`s First Commentary!
Paruko ga Babu! Kiba-ou, Hajimete no Jikkyou!!
episode.summary: When an accident transforms Paruko into a baby, it`s up to Gao to provide commentary on the Buddyfight match between Gaito and Tasuku. Guru Bunbuku and Gao`s buddies are in a race against time to find the cure. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ラスボス総進撃! ワルモノは誰だ!!
Final Boss All-out Attack! Who`s the Bad Guy?
Last Boss Soushingeki! Warumono wa Dare Da!!
episode.summary: The GGG Cup continues as Noboru faces Ikazuchi and his Hundred Demons and Kyoya Gaen and Wisdom pit their unique flag cards against each other. Meanwhile, Guru Bunbuku has a prophetic dream warning of villainy. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 牙王VSカナタ! バッツ・ドラム・バル勢ぞろい!!
Gao versus Kanata! Batzz, Drum and Bal, United!
Gaou vs Kanata! Battsu Drum Baru Seizoroi!!
episode.summary: Gao faces Kanata in the first match of the GGG Cup tournament. Guru Bunbuku reveals the next special guest, and Noboru shows off his new power. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: またな! 太陽番長よ永遠に!!
See You Again! Mighty Sun Fighter Forever!
Mata na! Taiyou Banchou to Eien ni!!
episode.summary: Gao Mikado`s final Buddyfight with Tasuku Ryuenji comes to an end, with several unexpected twists and turns. Gao`s thoughts turn to the future as he prepares to move to America. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 宿命の対決! 未門牙王VS龍炎寺タスク!!
Showdown of Destiny! Gao Mikado versus Tasuku Ryuenji!
Shukumei no Taiketsu! Mikadogaou vs Ryuuenji Task!!
episode.summary: Gao`s friends prepare for his impending departure as Gao faces Tasuku in the final match of the GGG Cup. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 壮絶! 煉獄騎士VS創世の超竜神!!
Dauntless! Purgatory Knight versus Supreme Dragon Deity of Creations!
Souzetsu! Rengoku Kishi vs Sousei no Chou Ryuujin!!
episode.summary: Gao and his friends are mystified when Kyoya Gaen asks Tasuku to face him as the Purgatory Knight for the second Semi-Final round of the GGG Cup. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 燃えよノボル! 涙のガチンコファイト!!
Burn Brightly, Noboru! A Tear-Soaked Serious Buddyfight!
Moeyo Noboru! Namida no Gachinko Fight!!
episode.summary: Gao`s friends begin to suspect that there`s more to the GGG Cup Tournament than meets the eye. Noboru confronts Gao about his secretive behavior during their semi-final match. Source: crunchyroll
